评论详情: Subtly hilarious and very well made.

评论概述: As A Proud Alumni, I'm Glad To Show My Fighting Mascots Pride
评论详情: Purchased for a "Pep Rally" themed work event.  Pros: -Font and style will make it pass as a normal looking university shirt to casual glances -Joke lands without being too corny or obtuse. -Color selection was great -Feels like a better quality shirt than the price would suggest  Cons: -Material is somewhat thinner than I'd like for a shirt I want to keep in rotation for a couple years. That said, it's better than what you'd expect for the price.  Overall: 5 Stars For what was going to be a throw-away purchase, this shirt has definitely exceed expectations. The joke is concealed enough that most people will have to take a look at it before they realize its a gag. It's shocking comfortable for the price and the lettering isn't the material that immediately begins to flake off after one or two washes.
Funny shirt and qualifies for my kids school dress code where they can only wear college print t-shirts!
The shirt fits well and is comfortable. There's nothing else to ask for than that. It looks like it does in the advertisement and that's it.
